responsibilities: Collaborate with product management, technical & partner marketing, and sales to develop product positioning and articulate key messaging.
Collaborate with technical and corporate marketing as a product expert to support NI’s go-to-market campaigns and bring new products to market.
Create white papers, presentations, videos, product demonstrations, and other web collateral to position and generate demand for NI’s products and technology.
Manage product launches and coordinate with cross-functional teams for successful rollouts.
Develop strong understanding of the target buyer persona(s) for NI’s products, including their needs, challenges, and decision drivers.
Develop expertise in applications for which CompactDAQ and CompactRIO address key customer challenges.
Support pre-sales activities as an NI product expert.
Support product centric sales training activities across direct and indirect channels.
Gather and analyze customer feedback to improve product messaging and positioning.
Monitor product and campaign performance metrics to assess marketing effectiveness.
Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and conferences.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on product marketing, positioning, and sales support for NI’s products, with no mention of training or fine-tuning language models. The responsibilities are centered around product management, marketing, and customer engagement rather than technical tasks related to language models.
